data.title: LKSN 2023
data.content: Participating in the 2023 National Student Competition in Web Technology was a truly enriching experience. I forged new friendships, embraced healthy competition, and ultimately earned a medallion for excellence. It was a proud culmination of my hard work.

data.title: HOOKI GROUP
data.content: As a Backend Developer intern at Hooki Group/PT Hooki Global Kreasi, I honed my skills in building robust websites using the Laravel PHP framework. I also gained proficiency in developing Restful APIs.

data.title: RED SYSTEM
data.content: I previously held a Frontend Developer internship at Red System / PT Guna Teknologi Nusantara. During my tenure, I acquired knowledge of web design and gained experience building websites using the Bootstrap CSS framework.
